review: I really like the fire stick. It's responsiveness is amazing. I have a smart TV but the software on in is not up to par. To have a smart TV and still choose the fire stick tells you a lot about the work that's been put in to making this item. It's even easy for my 4 year old to maneuver and you don't have this gigantic control with a thousand buttons that he wouldn't be able to use.
author: Rafael Barba

review: I like everything about the stick except for the fact that it has to be plugged in to work. Other than that the fire stick is a good little buy.
